title: League Client Crashing After Sign In?
body:
Just a weird bug that the second I try to log in on the client it says 'authenticating' then crashes asking if I want to send an error report even on an alternate account. Never seen this before and have already tried reinstalling and a bunch of other stuff like hex-tech repair tool. Anyone had a similar problem or any idea how to fix it?

(Also it started after I had played a game and left game open as a tab while watching YouTube, didn't occur with a patch or anything)

replies.body: Look in the "Help & Support" section of the boards. Me and some others are suffering the same issue and Riot have left some responses on one of the threads so take a look.
Yeah I've been looking, us two are the only ones I could find with the same issue of crashing after sign in. Nothing :(
